personal_info.headline: Founder | CEO at Busca Fretes and Co-Founder | COO | CPO at 343mobile
personal_info.name: Lucas Lessa
personal_info.summary: Helping companies and individuals in the digital transformation and architecture of mobile and Web solutions.Currently working as head of products and strategies at 343mobile. Iu2019m working in structuring, building and planning by the teams activities in the development of applications for Mobile platforms using various technologies and languages such as Net Core 2, C#, Java, Kotlin, Android, Dart, Flutter, Angular 6 with Time Material, and self study in Reactive Arquitecture.Reactive Systems are: Responsive, Resilient, Elastic and Message Driven. Systems built as Reactive Systems are more flexible, loosely-coupled and scalable. This makes them easier to develop and amenable to change. They are significantly more tolerant of failure and when failure does occur they meet it with elegance rather than disaster. Reactive Systems are highly responsive, giving users effective interactive feedback.Experience in creating multiplatform architecture, applications using Windows Azure, Amazon AWS, ESB.Graduated in Software Engineering. Postgraduate in strategies for systems architecture and focussed on agile methodologies such as (Scrum, XP, DDD, Clean Code, Continuous Integration, Kanban ...).Solid knowledge of object orientation, requirements specification, Functionals, Non-Functionals and Architectural. Development systems WebGreat capacity for learning, ease of teamwork and good relationships with customers. Professional goal: I would like to act as Technical Leader / Software Architect in miscellaneous projects, in a motivated and productive environment.
